trans-unit.source: Each player may bid life for control of target creature. You start the bidding with a bid of 0. In turn order, each player may top the high bid. The bidding ends if the high bid stands. The high bidder loses life equal to the high bid and gains control of the creature. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

trans-unit.target: {2}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：从目标对手的牌库中搜寻一张牌，并将它移出对战。 然后该牌手将他的牌库洗牌。 直到你下个维持开始，你可以使用该牌。 在你下个维持开始时，若你尚未使用它，则将它置入其拥有者的坟墓场。
trans-unit.note: 中文数据来自TSB（2006-10-06）；

trans-unit.target: 只要CARDNAME在堆叠上，每个生物便具有「{T}：于本回合中，防止CARDNAME接下来将对此生物造成的1点伤害。」

trans-unit.resname: MIR·205 | Afiya Grove | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有三个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: MIR·205 | Afiya Grove | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, move a +1/+1 counter from CARDNAME onto target creature.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，将一个+1/+1指示物从CARDNAME移到目标生物上。

trans-unit.resname: MIR·205 | Afiya Grove | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME has no +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice it.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME上没有+1/+1指示物时，将它牺牲。

trans-unit.resname: MIR·206 | Armor of Thorns | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You may cast CARDNAME as though it had flash. If you cast it any time a sorcery couldn't have been cast, the controller of the permanent it becomes sacrifices it at the beginning of the next cleanup step.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将CARDNAME视同具有闪现异能地来施放。如果你是于无法施放法术的时机下施放之，则在下一个清除步骤开始时，它所成之永久物的操控者将它牺牲。

trans-unit.resname: MIR·206 | Armor of Thorns | Card Text | Paragraph 2
MIR·207 | Barbed Foliage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature attacks you, it loses flanking until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个生物攻击你时，它失去侧面攻击异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MIR·206 | Armor of Thorns | Card Text | Paragraph 3
MIR·207 | Barbed Foliage | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature without flying attacks you, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to it.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个不具飞行异能的生物攻击你时，CARDNAME对它造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: MIR·208 | Brushwagg | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME blocks or becomes blocked, it gets -2/+2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME进行阻挡或被阻挡时，它得-2/+2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MIR·279 | Rock Basilisk | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME blocks or becomes blocked by a non-Wall creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

trans-unit.resname: MIR·209 | Canopy Dragon | Card Text | Paragraph 1
MIR·209 | Canopy Dragon | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {1}{G}: CARDNAME gains flying and loses trample until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {1}{G}：CARDNAME获得飞行异能且失去践踏异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MIR·210 | Crash of Rhinos | Card Text | Paragraph 1
MIR·211 | Cycle of Life | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return CARDNAME to its owner's hand: Target creature you cast this turn has base power and toughness 0/1 until your next upkeep. At the beginning of your next upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.
trans-unit.target: 将CARDNAME移回其拥有者手上：直到你的下个维持，目标你本回合中施放的生物之基础力量与防御力为0/1。在你的下一个维持开始时，在该生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: MIR·212 | Decomposition | Card Text | Paragraph 1
MIR·212 | Decomposition | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature has "Cumulative upkeep—Pay 1 life." (At the beginning of its controller's upkeep, that player puts an age counter on it, then sacrifices it unless they pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
trans-unit.target: 所结附的生物具有「累积维持～支付1点生命。」（在你的维持开始时，在此永久物上放置一个岁月指示物，然后除非你为其上每个岁月指示物支付其维持费用，否则牺牲之。）

trans-unit.resname: MIR·212 | Decomposition | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When enchanted creature dies, its controller loses 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 当所结附的生物死去时，其操控者失去2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: MIR·219 | Gibbering Hyenas | Card Text | Paragraph 1
MIR·220 | Granger Guildmage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {R}, {T}: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to any target and 1 damage to you.
trans-unit.target: {R}，{T}：CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成1点伤害，且对你造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: MIR·221 | Hall of Gemstone | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses a color. Until end of turn, lands tapped for mana produce mana of the chosen color instead of any other color.
trans-unit.target: 在每位牌手的维持开始时，该牌手选择一个颜色。直到回合结束，所有的地横置以产生法术力时，只能产生选择的那个颜色。

trans-unit.resname: MIR·220 | Granger Guildmage | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {W}, {T}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {W}，{T}：目标生物获得先攻异能直到回合结束。
